languageKey.label: Load GOK Data from Opac
Scheduler task to load PicaXML records from Opac.
Load and convert History CSV data
Scheduler task to download and convert the CSV files with local classification information for History to Pica XML which can be imported to the database.
Import GOK XML
Scheduler task to import LKL XML data from GOK into the Typo3 database.
Page id
The value for page id is not valid. Only positive integer allowed.
